thread.title: Alison Montana
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Alison Montana

author: Alison Montana
title: Alison Montana
text: The web site is easy to explore and the items we ordered arrived very quickly. They were reasonably priced. I had all but given up on finding the exact parts I needed for a bridge lamp from the 1940's but they were all available on the site. The diagrams that labeled lamp parts also acted as links for those parts which made it very easy. Our old lamp looks beautiful now and works well.
